title: Jimmy Lai’s Daughter Pushing US to Help Free Hong Kong Activist
description: The daughter of jailed Hong Kong democracy activist Jimmy Lai is pushing the Trump administration to help free her father, who was convicted late last year and has seen his health deteriorate during his incarceration.
content: The daughter of jailed Hong Kong democracy activist Jimmy Lai is pushing the Trump administration to help free her father, who was convicted late last year and has seen his health deteriorate during his incarceration.
